definitions.definition: A throw in which the wrestler lifts his opponent from the ground, swings him to one side, knocks up his nearer thigh from the back with the knee, and throws him on his back.
To throw (an opponent) using this technique.
Promotion or propaganda; especially exaggerated claims.
definitions.example: After all the hype for the diet plan, only the results ended up slim.

definitions.definition: To promote heavily; to advertise or build up.
definitions.example: They started hyping the new magazine months before its release.
